## Tender Description
Revised deadline for submitting bids: June 17, 2024 at 14:00:00 EDT. Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Suffield Research Centre (SRC) requires a Task Authorization Contract for Engineering support for the development of electromagnetic-based counter explosive threat technologies. The work will primarily be conducted at the contractor's facility or at the DRDC facility located at Suffield, Alberta. The period of the contract is from the date of award to March 31, 2029.
